sourcesContent: import { MovieService } from './../movie.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit', templateUrl: './edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit.component.css'] }) export class EditComponent { movie: Movie = {}; constructor(private service: MovieService){} NgOnSaveMovie(): void{ this.service.putMovie(this.movie, id).subscribe(arg => this.property = arg); } }
